dishes.name: Moussaka
dishes.description: Moussaka is a delicious and hearty traditional Greek dish with layers of thinly sliced eggplant, seasoned ground beef or lamb, and a creamy béchamel sauce. It's a beloved comfort food in Greece and is often enjoyed during special occasions and family gatherings. This savory dish is a culinary masterpiece that combines the richness of ground meat, the earthiness of eggplant, and the smoothness of béchamel sauce.

dishes.name: Greek Salad
dishes.description: Greek Salad is a fresh and vibrant dish featuring a colorful medley of ingredients, including ripe tomatoes, crisp cucumbers, Kalamata olives, and creamy feta cheese. It's a perfect choice for a light and healthy meal. This classic salad bursts with Mediterranean flavors and is known for its simplicity and freshness.

dishes.name: Souvlaki
dishes.description: Souvlaki is a popular Greek street food made of grilled skewers of marinated chicken or pork, served with warm pita bread and a generous dollop of tzatziki sauce. This dish is loved for its deliciously tender and flavorful meat, as well as its satisfying combination of textures and flavors.

dishes.name: Spanakopita
dishes.description: Spanakopita is a delightful Greek pastry made of flaky filo dough filled with a savory mixture of spinach, feta cheese, and aromatic herbs. Baked to golden perfection, this dish is known for its crispiness and savory filling. It's a favorite appetizer or snack in Greek cuisine.

dishes.name: Tzatziki
dishes.description: Tzatziki is a creamy and refreshing Greek dip made with yogurt, grated cucumber, garlic, and a blend of herbs. It's often served with pita bread or as a condiment for grilled meats. Tzatziki is beloved for its cool and tangy flavor, making it a perfect accompaniment to Mediterranean dishes.

dishes.name: Dolmades
dishes.description: Dolmades are a Mediterranean delight, featuring grape leaves stuffed with seasoned rice and aromatic herbs, served with a drizzle of lemon sauce. These bite-sized parcels are bursting with flavor and are often enjoyed as an appetizer or part of a meze platter.

dishes.name: Mediterranean Pasta
dishes.description: Mediterranean Pasta is a flavorful dish featuring pasta tossed with sun-dried tomatoes, Kalamata olives, artichoke hearts, and crumbled feta cheese. It's a Mediterranean twist on classic pasta that combines the richness of olives and tomatoes with the creaminess of feta cheese.

dishes.name: Grilled Octopus
dishes.description: Grilled Octopus is a seafood delicacy known for its tender and smoky flavor. It's prepared by grilling octopus until it's charred and served with a drizzle of lemon and olive oil. This dish is a must-try for seafood enthusiasts looking to savor the taste of the Mediterranean.

dishes.name: Saganaki
dishes.description: Saganaki is a delightful Greek appetizer featuring flaming cheese. Typically, a slice of cheese (often Kefalotyri, Graviera, or Halloumi) is dredged in flour, pan-fried, and then set ablaze at the table with the help of some brandy. The result is a gooey, slightly crispy, and deliciously cheesy dish that's served with a squeeze of lemon and bread.

dishes.name: Greek Lemon Chicken
dishes.description: Greek Lemon Chicken is a flavorful dish featuring roasted chicken with a lemon and oregano marinade. It's typically served with roasted potatoes, creating a harmonious blend of citrusy and savory flavors.
